title: Bloomberg Markets: The New Dynamics of Financial Globalization

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Susan Lund Partner McKinsey Global Institute Discussing financial globalization report and seeing a plunge in cross-border capital flows.
